Class SoundAudioDevice

java.lang.Object

      players.jl.SoundAudioDevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
javazoom.jl.player.AudioDevice
public class SoundAudioDevice
extends javazoom.jl.player.AudioDeviceBase

The JavaSoundAudioDevice implements an audio device by using the JavaSound API.

Since:
0.0.8
Author:
Mat McGowan
